entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 8:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -36.3°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
